resources.string:
Benefits of Plank 
1) Helps improve your posture. 
2) Might provide flexibility. 
3) Can help reduce joint and especially back pain. 
4) It can help improve metabolism.

Benefits of Lunges 
1) Weight loss. 
2) Balance and Stability. 
3) Alignment and Symmetry. 
4) Stand Taller.
Benefits of stepping \n1) Reduce Belly fat. \n2) It helps to improve posture.

Benefits of Crunches 
1) It helps to improve posture. 
2) Strong core. 
3) It helps in weight los. 
4) Strong muscles. 
5) Better cardiovascular health
Benefits of push ups \n1) Burning Calories. \n2) Improving your balance and posture.
